sec.p:
The elemental analyses were done by Varian UltraMass™ ICP-MS system (Varian Optical Spectroscopy Instruments, Melbourne Australia). The plasma source was 99.998% argon (Carbagas 3097, Liebefeld, Bern, Switzerland). All operating parameters were under computer control. Operating conditions of the instrument are depicted in Table 1.
Table 1
Operating conditions of Varian ICP-MS
Parameters Settings
Plasma conditions
RF power 1.40 kW
Plasma Ar flow rate. 18.0 L min −1
Auxiliary Ar flow rate 2.25 L min −1
Sheath gas flow 0.20 L min −1
Nebulizer gas flow 1.0 L min −1
Sampling depth 6.50 mm
Pump Rate 5 rpm
Instrument
Sampler cone: Nikel 1.0 mm orifice diameter
Skimmer cone: Nikel 0.5 mm orifice diameter
